snippet.title: 1-Year 'Prove-It' Deals Are Here to Stay in NFL Free Agency
snippet.description: This might go down as one of the richest NFL offseasons in recent memory, but we will remember it not for the huge long-term deals doled out, but the affordable one-year ones signed by some big names...

snippet.title: How Paul George Used Kobe Bryant as His Guide in Becoming an NBA Star
